entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Help customers keep their .NET SDK tooling up to date. #44421
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44416
  • ParseContainerProperties task normalizes the registry part of the repository #44408
  • Assembly uses 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=18.0.0.0 which has a higher version than referenced assembly 'Microsoft.iOS' with identity 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=17.2.0.0 #44388
  • dotnet watch Fails in Blazor #44384

Closed

  • dotnet.exe pack ignores pack=false #44374

PullRequests

Created

  • [ADD] dotnet solution: Migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #44402
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update checksum links to use SHA512 #44383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update to the shipped RC2 build #44364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix and simplify logic for setting the minimum VS version to display in the installer UI #44412
    Servicing-approved
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2567461 #44385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #44375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Address MD linter issues in VMR README.md #44376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Windows DevVersions VMR build leg #44387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove manual home variable lookup #44266
    Review for breaking changes, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
